bbox.height_drop_ratio_desc: 20% height drop , If current bbox height becomes less than 80% of previous height → person is collapsing vertically
bbox.width_increase_ratio_desc: If current bbox width becomes 20% wider than previous width → person is turning horizontal

keypoint.bent_posture_angle_desc: If average torso angle (shoulder→hip) exceeds 50 degrees → body is bending forward
keypoint.height_drop_desc: If body height (nose→ankle distance) drops by more than 30% → rapid fall-like collapse
keypoint.angle_window_desc: Use last 5 frames to calculate smooth torso angle average
keypoint.height_window_desc: Use last 5 frames to compute body height drop to reduce sudden noise

posture.head_inversion_threshold_desc: If head_y - ankle_y becomes > 0 → head is below ankle (abnormal fall posture)
